verses.verse: Then <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H5878>well<s%> of <S%H5878>Harod:<s%> so that the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> were on the <S%H6828>north<s%> side of them, by the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh,<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with you are too <S%H7227>many<s%> for me to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6286>vaunt<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> My own <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H3467>saved<s%> me.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H4994>go<s%> to, <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>Whoever<s%> is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H2730>afraid,<s%> let him <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H6852>depart<s%> <S%H6852>early<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%> And there <S%H7725>returned<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%> and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H5750>yet<s%> too <S%H7227>many;<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and I will <S%H6884>try<s%> them for you <S%H8033>there:<s%> and it shall be, that of <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H2088>This<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with you, the <S%H1931>same<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with you; and of <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H2088>This<s%> shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> with you, the <S%H1931>same<s%> shall not <S%H3212>go.<s%>

So he <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H4325>water:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> one that <S%H3952>laps<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> as a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H3952>laps,<s%> him shall you <S%H3322>set<s%> by himself; likewise <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H3766>bows<s%> down on his <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them that <S%H3952>lapped,<s%> putting their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3766>bowed<s%> down on their <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> By the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H3952>lapped<s%> will I <S%H3467>save<s%> you, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> the other <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6720>victuals<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and their <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the rest of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H2388>retained<s%> those <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was <S%H8478>beneath<s%> him in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3381>get<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4264>host;<s%> for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3373>fear<s%> to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> you with <S%H6513>Phurah<s%> your <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4264>host:<s%>

And you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H1696>say;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4264>host.<s%> Then <S%H3381>went<s%> he <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6513>Phurah<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> to the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H2571>armed<s%> men that were in the <S%H4264>host.<s%>

And the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> along in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> like <S%H697>grasshoppers<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>side<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

And when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5608>told<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> a <S%H6742>cake<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2015>tumbled<s%> into the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it that it <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and <S%H2015>overturned<s%> it, that the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> along.

And his <S%H7453>fellow<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> else <S%H1115>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for into his <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host.<s%>

And it was so, when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4557>telling<s%> of the <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and the <S%H7667>interpretation<s%> thereof, that he <S%H7812>worshipped,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

And he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> man's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with <S%H7385>empty<s%> <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> and <S%H3940>lamps<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7200>Look<s%> on me, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> when I <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> it shall be that, as I <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

When I <S%H8628>blow<s%> with a <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> I and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are with me, then <S%H8628>blow<s%> you the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> The sword of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>

So <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were with him, <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H821>watch;<s%> and they had but <S%H6965>newly<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> the <S%H8104>watch:<s%> and they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H5310>broke<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%> that were in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> and <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H3940>lamps<s%> in their <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> in their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H8628>blow<s%> with: and they <S%H7121>cried,<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>

And they <S%H5975>stood<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H8478>place<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H7321>cried,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> even throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host:<s%> and the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H1029>Bethshittah<s%> in <S%H6888>Zererath,<s%> and to the <S%H8193>border<s%> of <S%H65>Abelmeholah,<s%> to <S%H2888>Tabbath.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>gathered<s%> themselves together out of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and out of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> before them the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H1012>Bethbarah<s%> and <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6817>gathered<s%> themselves together, and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H1012>Bethbarah<s%> and <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%> <S%H6157>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb;<s%> and they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H6157>Oreb<s%> on the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H6157>Oreb,<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> at the wine <S%H3342>press<s%> of <S%H2062>Zeeb,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H6157>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
